apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays a joyful couple with a prominent heart floating between them, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded edges. The medium-light and medium skin tones are depicted with subtle, realistic gradients, conveying warmth and affection. This representation of love between two men, as seen on Apple devices, powerfully symbolizes partnership, deep connection, and romantic sentiment in digital conversations.
